A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 14, 2010''',<ref>[[wordofnotch:389572897|"Visible player hand and new level themes"]] &ndash; The Word of Notch, February 14, 2010</ref> at 21:43 UTC, which added 2 map themes, "Paradise" and "Woods".

== Additions ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[Seed (world generation)|Seeds]]'''
* Added 2 new [[map theme]]s, "Paradise" and "Woods".

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Dirt JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Dirt]]'''
* Any dirt at or below sea level, when exposed to enough light, is turned into grass, upon world generation.

=== General ===
'''[[HUD]]'''
* The player's hand now displays again.
** However, the idle animation is shown when the player opens the inventory.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* When the game cannot find a suitable place to spawn a [[starting house]], it simply does not spawn.
** Commonly occurs in Small, Deep maps and Small, Long maps.
** This bug lasts until the end of Indev.
